Analysis.name: Sessile serrated lesion detection rate
Bias.arising.from.the.randomization.proc: Low risk

Quote: "Participants were randomized in a 1:1:1:1 ratio into 4 groups (LCIþEAC, LCI alone, EAC alone, and standard HD colonoscopy) (Fig. 1) by computer-generated randomization." and "The sequence of allocation was concealed in a sealed envelope that was opened before the colonoscopy."
Bias.due.to.deviations.from.intended.int: Low risk

Participants and producers are not blind, but results are unlikely to be affected.

Intention-to-treat analysis
Bias.in.measurement.of.the.outcome.suppo: Probably outcome assessment is not blinded, but unlikely to be influenced by the results.
Bias.in.selection.of.the.reported.result: Some concerns
Study protocol did not mention serrated adenoma detection rate.
Overall.bias.support: Risk of bais in bias in selection of the reported result was some concern.

Analysis.name: Sessile serrated lesion detection rate
Bias.arising.from.the.randomization.proc: Low risk

Quote: "Randomisation was performed by an independent computer-generated random numbers program ( www.castoredc.nl, Castor Electronic Data Capture, Amsterdam, the Netherlands), with online access for all participating centres."
Bias.due.to.deviations.from.intended.int: Low risk
Boston Bowel Preparation Score <6 and incomplete colonoscopy were excluded before randomization but may not influence the results.
Bias.in.measurement.of.the.outcome.suppo: Probably outcome assessment is not blinded, but unlikely to be influenced by the results.
Bias.in.selection.of.the.reported.result: Some concerns
Study protocol did not mention serrated adenoma detection rate.
Overall.bias.support: Risk of bias in selection of the reported result was some concern.

Analysis.name: Sessile serrated lesion detection rate
Bias.arising.from.the.randomization.proc: Low risk
Quote: "The recruited patients were randomly allocated to the WLI or LCI arm at a 1:1 ratio by using the sealed envelope method."
Bias.due.to.deviations.from.intended.int: Some concerns
Patients with a history of inflammatory bowel disease were excluded.
Bias.due.to.missing.outcome.data.support: In the LCI and WLI groups, 3 and 2 patients were excluded from obstruction by CRC, respectively, and 3 and 3 patients were excluded from not reaching the cecum, respectively. These deviations occurred randomly because colonoscopy could not be performed. Eight patients in the LCI group and seven in the WLI group were excluded because biopsy or resection specimens failed to yield histology. These deviations occurred randomly and by excluding no histrology by biopsy or resected specimens, the adenoma detection rate bwteen LCI and WLI can be evaluated more accurately.
Bias.in.measurement.of.the.outcome.suppo: Probably outcome assessment is not blinded, but unlikely to be influenced by the results.
Bias.in.selection.of.the.reported.result: Low risk
Study protocol is available, and all primary and secondary outcomes have been reported.
Overall.bias.support: Risk of bias in bias due to deviations from intended interventions was some concern.

Analysis.name: Sessile serrated lesion detection rate

Quote: "Anonymization was ensured by allocating codes specific to the study instead of using personal information, such as patient name and ID."

Bias.in.selection.of.the.reported.result: Some concerns

Analysis.name: Sessile serrated lesion detection rate
Bias.arising.from.the.randomization.proc: Low risk
Quote: "The investigators used a central customized system (https://uapkd.bioknow.net/#/) to generate random numbers for the group assignments for the eligible patients at each center."
Bias.due.to.deviations.from.intended.int: Some concerns

Patients with refusal were excluded after randomization. However, one person with refusal in each group is excluded, but the impact is small because the number of rejections is the same among each group and the number of rejections is small.
Bias.due.to.missing.outcome.data.support: One person in each group is excluded, but the impact is small because the number of rejections is the same among each group and the number of rejections is small.
Bias.in.measurement.of.the.outcome.suppo: Study protocol did not mention serrated adenoma detection rate.
Bias.in.selection.of.the.reported.result: Some concerns
Risk of bais in selection of the reported result was some concern.
Overall.bias.support: Risks of bias due to deviations from intended interventions and in selection of the reported result were some concerns.

Analysis.name: Sessile serrated lesion detection rate
Bias.arising.from.the.randomization.proc: Low risk

Quote: "Randomization was performed via dynamic balancing using the minimization 12 method, with stratification by age (<60 versus ≥60 years), sex (male versus female), pretrial history of colonoscopy (yes versus no), and institution. A computer-generated randomization list, pre-ordered for each stratum, was used. The randomization sequence was concealed for all investigators. The patients and investigators were not blinded to observation group allocation.
Bias.due.to.deviations.from.intended.int: Low risk

Participants and producers are not blind, but results are unlikely to be affected.

Intention-to-treat analysis
Bias.in.measurement.of.the.outcome.suppo: Probably outcome assessment is not blinded, but unlikely to be influenced by the results.
Bias.in.selection.of.the.reported.result: Low risk
Study protocol is available, and all primary and secondary outcomes have been reported.
Overall.bias.support: All domains are low risk of bias.
